Message.ECSResponse: Failure - request, Data error, Postcode not found. Expected formats: <country specific post code format>

OrderType.description: Order Type Code. Value should be based on Location and Company

ExpectedDeliveryDate.description: Expected date. Format should be MM/dd/yyyy. It is optional

DeliveryNumber.description: Delivery Number used for the shipment. It can be a Ship Request ID generated for the ship request

CurrencyCode.description: Currency Code of the shipper. If not sent from payload will be fetched from Database based on Location and Company

ShipFromInfo.description: Ship from details(Origin details). If sent null, details will be fetched from Database

CarrierAccountNum.description: Carrier Account number. User can send configured Carrier Account number to fetch relevant carrier details for the shipment. If not sent, carrier details will be taken from Database based on Location and Company

ServiceLevelName.description: Carrier Service level name. Carrier Service used for the shipment

ShipDate.description: Shipment date. Format should be MM/dd/yyyy

Packagedetail.description: Details of the Packages to be shipped

WeightUnits.description: Unit of weight. Depends on the Carrier/Country. If not sent from the payload it will be fetched from database based on Location/Plant

NoOfBoxes.description: Total number of boxes in the package. Pass in case of multilevel shipments. Number of boxes available in package should be equal to "NoOfBoxes" given in a package

DimensionUnit.description: Unit of measuring dimension(LBH) of the package. If not sent from the payload it will be fetched from database based on Location/Plant

LTLClass.description: Class of the package. Required Field for LTL shipments

CODAmount.description: Cash on delivery amount, if applicable

CODCurrencyCode.description: Cash on delivery currency code, if applicable.

LPNNumber.description: License plate number of the package

Dimension.description: Dimension of the package. It is in the following format: Length X Breadth/Width X Height

MultiLevel.description:
*A Flag to enable/disable **Multilevel** package.*
Pallets can be example of Multi-level packing (Pallet --> Boxes --> Items)

Items.description: List of items. When multi-level flag is false, list of items is sent directly in the packagedetail and is a Required field

Quantity.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the package

BalanceQty.description: Total number of unpacked Item/Product. It is set as default to zero

PartialQty.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the package

ItemWeight.description: Weight of each item(single unit) in the package

Dimension.description: Dimension of the item. It is in the following format: Length X Breadth/Width X Height

UNITVALUE.description: Value of packing item/product(used for customs)

CLASS.description: Class of the item packed in the package

ECCN.description: ECCN(Export Control Classification Number) number. Used for International Shipments

COUNTRYORIGIN.description: Country of origin. Used for International Shipments

UOM.description: Unit of measurement. The unit in which the quantity of an item is managed. Required Field for international shipments to generate commercial invoice

DelLineItemNum.description: DelLineItemNum. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderNumber.description: Order Number. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderLineItemNum.description: Order line item number. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderClass.description: Order Class. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderType.description: Order Type. Used for EDI shipments only

CustomerPONum.description: Customer PO Number. Used for EDI shipments only

NoOfUnitsShipped.description: No Of Units Shipped. Used for EDI shipments only

HTSCode.description: HTS Code. Used for EDI shipments only

DestHTSCode.description: Destination HTS Code. Used for EDI shipments only

LicenseNo.description: License Number. Used for EDI shipments only

Hazardous.description: Hazardous material. Used for EDI shipments only

COO.description: COO. Used for EDI shipments only

CurrencyType.description: Currency Type. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom1.description: Item Custom 1. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom2.description: Item Custom 2. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom3.description: Item Custom 3. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom4.description: Item Custom 4. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom5.description: Item Custom 5. Used for EDI shipments only

BoxInfo.description: Detail of the Box. When multi-level flag is true,'BoxInfo' is sent from the payload and list of items are sent inside 'BoxInfo' and is a Required field

TotalItemQuantity.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the Box. It should be equal to total number of items(list of items) inside the box

BalanceQuantity.description: Total number of unpacked Item/Product. It is set as default to zero

PartialQuantity.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the Box

TotalQuantity.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the Box

Dimension.description: Dimension of the Box.It is in the following format: Length X Breadth/Width X Height

IsRepack.description: Repack Good enable/disable flag for the Box

DGFlag.description: Dangerous Good enable/disable flag for the Box

Weight.description: Total weight value of the Box. Box weight should be equal to total weight of items inside the box

Quantity.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the package

BalanceQty.description: Total number of unpacked Item/Product. It is set as default to zero

PartialQty.description: Total number of Item/Product packed inside the package

ItemWeight.description: Weight of each item(single unit) in the package

Dimension.description: Dimension of the item. It is in the following format: Length X Breadth/Width X Height

UNITVALUE.description: Value of packing item/product(used for customs)

CLASS.description: Class of the item packed in the package

ECCN.description: ECCN(Export Control Classification Number) number. Used for International Shipments

HARMONISEDCODE.description: Harmonised code. Used for International Shipments

COUNTRYORIGIN.description: Country of origin. Used for International Shipments

UOM.description: Unit of measurement. The unit in which the quantity of an item is managed. Required Field for international shipments to generate commercial invoice

DelLineItemNum.description: DelLineItemNum. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderNumber.description: Order Number. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderLineItemNum.description: Order line item number. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderClass.description: Order Class. Used for EDI shipments only

OrderType.description: Order Type. Used for EDI shipments only

CustomerPONum.description: Customer PO Number. Used for EDI shipments only

NoOfUnitsShipped.description: No Of Units Shipped. Used for EDI shipments only

HTSCode.description: HTS Code. Used for EDI shipments only

DestHTSCode.description: Destination HTS Code. Used for EDI shipments only

LicenseNo.description: License Number. Used for EDI shipments only

Hazardous.description: Hazardous material. Used for EDI shipments only

COO.description: COO. Used for EDI shipments only

CurrencyType.description: Currency Type. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom1.description: Item Custom 1. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom2.description: Item Custom 2. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom3.description: Item Custom 3. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom4.description: Item Custom 4. Used for EDI shipments only

ItemCustom5.description: Item Custom 5. Used for EDI shipments only

GrossWeight.description: Gross Weight. Used for EDI shipments only

UOM.description: Unit of measurement. Used for EDI shipments only

Volume.description: Total Volume. Used for EDI shipments only

VolumeUOM.description: EDI Volume Unit of measurement. Used for EDI shipments only

DimUOM.description: EDI Dimension unit of measurement. Used for EDI shipments only

HandlingID.description: Handling ID. Used for EDI shipments only

TrackingNumber.description: Tracking Number. Used for EDI shipments only

NoOfLineItems.description: No Of Line Items. Used for EDI shipments only

PackageCustom1.description: Package Custom 1. Used for EDI shipments only

PackageCustom2.description: Package Custom 2. Used for EDI shipments only

PackageCustom4.description: Package Custom 4. Used for EDI shipments only

PackageCustom5.description: Package Custom 5. Used for EDI shipments only

PackageCustom3.description: Package Custom 3. Used for EDI shipments only

PackagingMaterial.description: Packaging Material. Used for EDI shipments only

DryIceWeight.description: Dry Ice Weight. Used for EDI shipments only

DryIceWeightUOM.description: Dry Ice Weight UOM. Used for EDI shipments only

PONo.description: Purchase order number. Used for EDI shipments only

Commodities.description: List of the Commodities for an international shipment

WeightUnits.description: Unit of measurement for weight of the Commodity. If not sent from the payload it will be fetched from database based on Location/Plant

CountryOfManufacture.description: Country of manufacture of the product

UnitValue.description: Value of packing item/product(used for customs)

UOM.description: Unit of measurement. The unit in which the quantity of an item is managed

IsDutiable.description: Is Dutiable value is Y or N

DeclaredValueCurrency.description: Currency of Declared value for the shipment

InvoiceDate.description: Invoice Date. Format for date is MM/dd/yyyy

DutiesPaymentType.description: International Duties payment type for the destination

MRNNumber.description: MRN(Movement Reference Number) Number for the shipment

BookingConfirmationNumber.description: Booking Confirmation Number for the shipment

SpecialService.description: List of special services enabled for the shipment

SaturdayDelivery.description: A flag to Enable/disable delivery service on Saturday

SaturdayPickup.description: A flag to Enable/disable Pickup service on Saturday

InsideDelivery.description: A flag to Enable/disable Inside delivery service

InsidePickup.description: A flag to Enable/disable Inside Pickup service

SignatureRequired.description: A flag to Enable/disable Signature check during the Delivery

ReturnServiceCode.description: Return Service Code used incase of return

Paymentinformation.description: Payor Information. Incase of Payment type as 'Sender', payment information should be same as ship from details.Incase of Payment type as 'Receiver', payment information should be same as ship to details

PayerAccountNumber.description: Payor Account number. Required Field when Payment Type is "Third Party"

FTPURL.description: FTP URL. Used for EDI shipments only

REMOTEFILEPATH.description: Remote file path. Used for EDI shipments only

FTPID.description: FTP ID. Used for EDI shipments only

FTPPASSWORD.description: FTP Password. Used for EDI shipments only

UPLOADFILENAME.description: Upload file name. Used for EDI shipments only

PORT.description: Port. Used for EDI shipments only

PikcupDate.description: Expected Pickup date.Format should be MM/dd/yyyy

ConsolidatedMainInfo.description: Consolidated Main details. Used in EDI shipments only.

HazardousMaterial.description: Hazardous Material. If not sent from payload it is by default NH

SourceOfError.description: If an Error Occurred, lets the user know the source of the error.Can be Database,Shipping Engine,API etc.

ECSResponse.description: Lets the user know the response message from Shipping Engine.Can be 'Success' or any Error Message

ManifestResponse.description: Lets the user know the response message from Manifest service.Can be 'Success' or any Error Message

OrderNo.description: Equivalent to Delivery number sent from the payload

TrackingNo.description: Tracking Number generated for the shipment

DOCUMENTTYPE.description: Type of Document.Type can be Label,Form,Report etc.
